item.title: Migrate Static Site to Digital Ocean Web App Platform
item.description: Digital Ocean released a new App Platform for running serverless apps with support in their free-tier for static sites. There are two approaches to hosting a static site on the App Platform, either include the build process in the repo and allow App Platform to build your site, or use a branch/repo with only the HTML output.
